 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִלְצָל‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** ==whirring, buzzing==; — construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶרֶץ צִלְצַל כְּנָפָ֑יִם‎</span> [[Isa.18.1|Isa 18:1]] ***land of buzzing of*** (insects ') ***wings*** (so probably; other views see in [[BDB#Di|Di]]). 

 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִלְצָל‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** ==spear== (from ***whizzing***); — construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִלְצַל דָּגִים‎</span> [[Job.40.31|Job 40:31]] ***fish-spear, harpoon.*** 

 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְלָצַ֑ל‎</span> **noun masculine** ==a whirring locust== (compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ƒarƒaru***</u></abbr>, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup> Ges. Abh. 145, N. 9</sup>); — [[Deut.28.42|Deut 28:42]] (devouring; not identified; [[BDB#Tristr|Tr]]<sup>NHB 313</sup>). 

 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֶלְצְלִים‎</span> **noun masculine plural** musical instrument of percussion, ==cymbals== (with ***clashing*** sound; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֶלְצַל‎</span>, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎צֶלְצְלִין‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צ‎</span> [[2Sam.6.5|2Sam 6:5]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְנַעַנְעִים‎</span>, q. v.; \|\| [[1Chr.13.8|1Chr 13:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצִלְתַּיִם‎</span>); construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִלְצְלֵישָֿׁ֑מַע‎</span> [[Ps.150.5|Ps 150:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּרוּעָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צ‎</span> v[[Ps.150.5|Ps 150:5]] &amp;m;d compare [[BDB#Now|Now]]<sup>Archaeology i. 272 f., 272 f.</sup> [[BDB#Benz|Benz]]<sup>Archaeology 277</sup> [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>Psalms Eng. Tr. 232</sup>.
